text: @GNev2 Awe ffs!!...now your sticking your considerable beak into the Coronavirus situation. Totally ruin every feckin game you CO-commentate on, can’t shut the feck up..and now wants to run the country. Well u can’t, Piers Morgan beat u to it!!
